We aim to deliver items within 4 working days.

If you have requested a replacement for a damaged bin or box, or an exchange, please leave the damaged item or your current bin at the front of your property from 7am on the next working day.

Any items for replacement or exchange should be left within the boundary of your property where they can be clearly seen and reached from the road. It does not matter if they have any rubbish or recycling in them.

Should we have any queries regarding your request, we will contact you to clarify your requirements.
